name: Alice Mystery Garden
description: Join Alice, who has wandered into the wondrous land of Alice Mystery Garden, to overcome adversity in this VR action-puzzle game. Control Alice's movements while switching back and forth between a top-down player perspective and Alice's in-world perspective to collect scattered looking-glass fragments and clear each stage.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1.4 GB available space
